sentences.english: What is the advantage of Hainan in PPRD framework?
sentences.chinese: 在泛珠三角合作的中，我们必须正确看待海南的优势。

sentences.english: If the Hongkong-Zhuhai-Macau Bridge is built, the economy of the Pan-Pearl River Delta will grow much more rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 如果兴建港珠澳大桥，泛珠三角的经济将会迅猛发展。

sentences.english: It is urgent to strengthen the cooperation of aviation port industry in Pan Pearl River Delta(PPRD).
sentences.chinese: 加强泛珠三角区域航空港合作是一个比较紧迫的问题。

sentences.english: Hence, the cooperation and development of Pan Pearl River Delta re-gion hinges on its traffic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 因此，泛珠三角区域合作与发展的关键在交通。

definition: Pearl River Delta
